headline: The VASSAL Team is happy to announce VASSAL {{version}}.
important: NEW! 64-bit ARM packages: There are now MacOS and Windows packages for 64-bit ARM processors. If you have a Mac with an Apple Silicon CPU (which is a 64-bit ARM processor), we recommend using the 64-bit ARM build.
Code deprecated more than a year ago has been removed. Modules containing custom code using that code MUST be updated if they are to work with {{version_feature}}.
Things may be broken which worked previously. If you find a new bug, please report it.

Modules saved in {{version_feature}} are not openable by earlier versions of VASSAL. We recommend keeping a backup copy of any pre-{{version_feature}} modules you plan to modify in {{version_feature}} until you've verified that everything works to your satisfaction.

bug_fixes.desc: Deck "send-when-empty" hotkeys no longer create extra undo steps
ActionButtons set to count 0 times don't spuriously execute 1 time
Fixed multiplayer problems with detach option on Deselect trait
SendToLocation, Can Rotate, and MoveFixedDistance were all unlinking from deck/stack at wrong time, causing buggy behavior in some instances especially involving decks
Clear up mark-when-moved problems for modules which still had a legacy value set
'OldMat' properties now set correctly regardless of order of Mat Cargo and Send-to-Location (etc.) traits
Triggers set to count 0 times don't spuriously execute 1 time
Deck's Send-when-Empty key now processes AFTER fully moving last card
ActionButtons with context menu flag no longer trigger context menu when a different ActionButton on same piece (that doesn't have the flag set) is clicked
Don't +1 inventory sum if property isn't even defined
Prevent NPE when right-clicking on a Deck with no menu items
Deck Empty Hotkey no longer repeats per online player instance, nor when stepping forward a log

other_improvements.desc: Reinstate removal of module tile cache when a module is removed from the Module Manager
Update Apple Silicon terminology in preferences and docs
Add missing Section size symbol to NATO markers
Spaces in GKC reports made consistent with all other reports
Allow option for only first Mouseover-stack Viewer that generates a tooltip will be drawn

bug_fixes.desc: Since 3.6.7, French/Belgian AZERTY keyboards on Mac were experiencing problems with Ctrl / Alt keys on the number key row
IndexOutOfBoundsException trying to open a private note
At-Start stacks were getting confused by blank boards
Show translated module name and descriptions in Module Manager
Reinstate translation of Player Sides
Global Key Command fastmatch for Mats fixed to avoid trait-order bugs
Corrected "Mark When Moved" documentation
Hide FileConfigurer label in preferences dialogs
NPE when current-stack option used on non-stacking piece
Insert items into formatted strings from drop-down list into the correctly selected position

other_improvements.desc: Debug window shows board-relative coordinates if they are different from the map-relative ones
MatCargo's mat detection did unnecessary computations for lack of parentheses
Clear Tile Cache with more efficient Files.walkFileTree()
